comment: * Abstract class that drawables supporting animations and callbacks should extend.

methods.name: void registerAnimationCallback(@NonNull AnimationCallback callback)
methods.comment:
* Adds a callback to listen to the animation events.
     *
     * @param callback Callback to add.

methods.name: boolean unregisterAnimationCallback(@NonNull AnimationCallback callback)
methods.comment:
* Removes the specified animation callback.
     *
     * @param callback Callback to remove.
     * @return {@code false} if callback didn't exist in the call back list, or {@code true} if
     *         callback has been removed successfully.
